review_data.title: Best Dim Sum in Zurich
review_data.content: At last, I found the best dim sum in Zurich! Very authentic and good quality! Especially the purple yam dumpling. I also tried the cold chilli chicken & fried spate ribs with garlic n 5 spice. Absolutely delicious. Can’t wait to go back again.

review_data.title: Excellent dim sum
review_data.content: Unassuming restaurant that convinces with really excellent dishes and a very friendly and attentive service! Clearly recommend; this is an authentic Chinese restaurant. I recommend choosing and sharing different dim sum. The scallops were superb!

review_data.title: Authentic Dimsum from Hong Kong
review_data.content: As a Hongkonger, I'm extremely happy and excited to have this restaurant in town for healing my homesick. I went there with friends for lunch and tried the lunch set, really good for first time trying and will definitely go more often!

review_data.title: Very satisfied
review_data.content: I came here again, hoping that the standard could be maintained, but it was not disappointing. There was still a lot of improvement in the standard, especially the “shrimp dumplings” and “xiaolongbao”. For Zurich, it was No. 1 here.
